Author: strangernumberone
Text: People can be assholes, whether or not that's there intention. One of my guy friends in high school was joking about drugs at lunch one day and told me I should do crack because I was fat and it would make me lose weight. I was so hurt. We had a positive relationship after that until he died about 3 years later. Even though the loss makes me sad and I miss him, that conversation is always the first thing that comes to my mind when I think of him.
